title: Blueprint, "Villa of M. Hemsy, St. Cloud, Plan du Rez de Chaussee", ca. 1913
signed: Right left in white: Hector Guimard.
inscribed:
inscribed in plate, upper right: L'Architecte/ Hector Guimard; in upper left corner, in square: l08; in upper right corner in square: 2. 
Inscribed on top: PROPRIETE DE MONSR HEMPSY A ST CLOUD.
Directly below top inscription: PLAN DU REZ DE CHAUSSEE.
description: Design and floor plan for the Rez de Chaussee. Depiction of floor plan detailing rooms in center left. Flowing decorative patterns behidn plan. Inscriptions on top.

tombstone.epitaph:
Blueprint, "Villa of M. Hemsy, St. Cloud, Plan du Rez de Chaussee", ca. 1913.
ca. 1913. Blueprint on white wove paper. Gift of Mme. Hector Guimard. 1950-66-18.
